description: Detects when institutions shift meanings, euphemize harm, or weaponize terminology to maintain control, avoid accountability, or distort public understanding.

variables.R(t): Repetition of distorted terms in official messaging
variables.T(t): Truth transparency—clear, grounded definitions or disclosures

response: Clarity is accountability. Strip away euphemism. Say what it is. If a word hides harm, it’s not language—it’s armor.
